data.message: Every time I try to log in with Facebook to register the code it keeps saying we have an account in my name already so I press connect and says the same thing. USELESS but your not useless at providing good drinks just knock the holiday thing on the head please :)

replies.message: They stopped listing bout a week ago. Lol

Hi Mathias, we're sorry to hear this. Please could you try clearing the cookies on your browser and then trying to log in again. If you need any more help please call our team on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1), Monday - Friday, 9am - 6pm, who will be happy to help. Thanks
Hi Dave, the promotional campaign is still running. You have the chance of winning a dream holiday until the 9th of July. Thanks :)

But at the end of the day I chucked away the bottle which negates me checking but I realise that all coke bottles are different, ergo I could get a tasty coke first on the left at the shop and check the cap using the csi you provided I'll clear the cache :)

As my good mate Mathias Killjoy said he threw the bottle away, ergo he would have to purchase another bottle of your delicious coke, but I will have to take issue with one part of his comment, that his nearest retailer of your tasty coke is actually first on his right
But first on my right would take you down the other road which would negate that retailer ergo first on your right, first on your left, first on your right all directions are different.

But at the end of the day the sun goes down, also if u gonna go first on your left and then left again and left again and follow road up to your nearest retailer of delicious coke, your need a bottle of delicious coke after your walk.
Well u no what they say, great minds think alike, and so do ours
